content.rendered:
Sandhya is passionate about lecturing. She has eighteen years of teaching experience in universities and FE institutions. She is proud in being committed to  providing comprehensive, focused and student-centred lectures with an understanding and appreciation of students from diverse backgrounds. A skilled educator with panache for academic ethics and quality assurance, she teaches modules focusing on Marketing and HR specialisations for MSc, BSc, BA and Top-up (Level 3 to Level 7).

Key responsibilities

  • Deliver blending learning with focus on class engagement
  • Update courses, scheme of work, lesson-plans, lecture notes and course materials
  • Provide effective feedback, support, and guidance to students
  • Engage in staff development activities relating to teaching, learning and assessment
